title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Language Education Inquiry Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply a language acquisition model analogous to electrical circuit principle simulations in educational contexts
Identify three or more key variables in a language learning simulation based on just-in-time inquiry prompts
Prepare a report connecting simulation results to language education theories (e.g., Interaction Hypothesis) through principle-based self-explanation

Learners can develop one simulation-based language education module applicable to actual corporate training environments through a PBL team project and achieve 80+ points on the internal corporate evaluation rubric (content relevance 30%, practicality 30%, innovation 20%, completeness 20%).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
